__e: Not to worry, Worf, I only peak after the hand is over.
Mr. Worf I know this is difficult for you.
I care about you, Worf and I would never do anything to hurt you.
Worf is only part of the reason I'm here.
Unless Worf is not the only one you're sharing a bed with this trip.
Mr. Worf,... ..isn't it time for the truth about your father's innocence to be told?
Worf, they're going to be here any minute.
Worf, you do know what to do.
If your body's tired tomorrow Worf won't even be able to save you.
Well, having Worf on board certainly has been.
Will, how long is this thing between you and Worf going to go on?
Worf and I will be safe.
Captain, Lt Worf and I are working well together.
